author: Mitch Anderson
description:
Canada’s new energy minister Tim Hodgson is getting mixed messages from Pathways Alliance, the lobby group representing six of the largest oil sands producers. On one hand, the members claim to be moving forward with a massive carbon capture and storage (CCS) proposal that will only become economically viable through billions in public subsidies and […]

The post Pathways Alliance Lobbied for Policy That Hurts Its CCS Viability appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Pathways Alliance Lobbied for Policy That Hurts Its CCS Viability

author: Sam Bright and Geoff Dembicki
description:
Donald Trump’s officials and allies have flocked to Poland this week as they try to turn the tide in favour of far-right candidate Karol Nawrocki ahead of Sunday’s presidential ballot. Key MAGA influencers – including Trump’s own head of Homeland Security – attended CPAC Poland on 27 May, urging Poland to elect Nawrocki of the […]

The post ‘Here to Return the Favour’: MAGA Descends on Poland Ahead of Crucial Vote appeared first on DeSmog.
title: ‘Here to Return the Favour’: MAGA Descends on Poland Ahead of Crucial Vote

author: Hazel Healy and Brigitte Wear
description:
La version originale de cet article a été publiée en anglais sur DeSmog le 22 mai 2025. À l’entrée du marché aux poissons, à la périphérie de Joal-Fadiouth, ville côtière du centre du Sénégal, un groupe de femmes s’est installé à l’ombre d’un petit pavillon.  Autrefois, le marché était animé par des vendeurs de glaces […]

The post Enquête : Le bar vendu dans les supermarchés britanniques au cœur d’une surpêche dévastatrice au Sénégal  appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Enquête : Le bar vendu dans les supermarchés britanniques au cœur d’une surpêche dévastatrice au Sénégal
